definitions.definition: The action of vexing , annoying , or irritating someone or something; ( countable ) an instance of this.

subdefinitions.definition: The action of physically annoying or irritating a person or an animal ; ( countable ) an instance of this; also, a physical discomfort or disorder .
The action of vexing or annoying someone by bringing unjustified legal proceedings against them; ( countable ) an instance of this.

definitions.definition: The state of being vexed, annoyed, or irritated; annoyance , irritation ; also, disappointment , discontentment , unhappiness ; ( countable ) an instance of this.

subdefinitions.definition: The state of being mentally distressed or troubled .
The state of being physically annoyed or irritated.

definitions.definition: A source of mental distress or trouble ; an affliction , a woe ; also, a source of annoyance or irritation; an annoyance, an irritant .
The action of using force or violence on someone or something; ( countable ) an instance of this.

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The action of vexing , annoying , or irritating someone or something; ( countable ) an instance of this.
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The state of being vexed, annoyed, or irritated; annoyance , irritation ; also, disappointment , discontentment , unhappiness ; ( countable ) an instance of this.
( countable ) A source of mental distress or trouble ; an affliction , a woe ; also, a source of annoyance or irritation; an annoyance, an irritant .
( obsolete , uncountable ) The action of using force or violence on someone or something; ( countable ) an instance of this.
